lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Although the steps already taken to reposition and solidify Canadian Pacific point to a better financial performance in 1987, more remains to be accomplished if the company is to produce returns that meet shareholder expectations," it said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Canadian Pacific said despite lower earnings and extraordinary charges, its overall cash position strengthened in 1986 as cash generated from operations and asset sales was more than sufficient to finance capital expenditures of 1.80 billion dlrs.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "To achieve this goal will require that the businesses comprising Canadian Pacific are leaders in their respective fields," the company said in the report to shareholders.
